name: Jon McClure
description: '''Jon McClure''' (born 22 December 1981), known as '''The Reverend''', is an English musician. He is the [[Singing|lead singer]] and frontman of [[Reverend and The Makers]], and ex-vocalist of 1984 and Judan Suki. He says that the name "Reverend" became his [[Nickname|moniker]] because "I'm a big mouth and always running on at people".
